channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023061357
item.description:
Report X-2023061357

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-08T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-02
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023061357, X-2023061358, X-2023061359: X-rayed 11pc shipment and saw and outline of what appeared to be nail polish in1 tote and an aerosol in 1 other clear tote. Opened the 1st tote and found the following: 1 - 16oz (used) Acetone nail polish remover, 2 - 8oz Perfume, Flammable liquids, 1 lighter, 2 - 2oz hand sanitizer, flammable, 2 - 1oz hand sanitizer, Flammable, 31 bottles of nail polish (1-0.31oz, 8-0.4oz, 2-0.44oz, 4-0.45oz, 16- 0.5oz). The other clear tote could see an aerosol can, opened shipment and found 1-7oz satin care shave gel (aerosol) Accepting RSA marked they had reviewed trigger terms and inspected outside for dangerous goods marking. Accepting CSA also asked customer if there were any dangerous goods inside the shipment and they stated it does not.

item.title: Report X-2023070177
item.description:
Report X-2023070177

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-09
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK

  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-RAYED SHIPMENT IN BIG X RAY. SAW AN OUTLINE THAT APPEARED TO BE AEROSOLS. CONFIRMED WITH PHYSICAL SEARCH. FOUND 5 AEROSOLS IN ONE PIECE OF THE SHIPMENT ONLY. CLAIRE'S GLITTER HAIRSPRAY. 3OZ, 85G EACH

item.title: Report X-2023061323
item.description:
Report X-2023061323

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA, A PACKAGE BROKE OPEN REVEALING VARIOUS BOXES OF AMMUNITION. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE AMMUNITION WAS BEING SHIPPED. THE PACKAGE WAS FLOWN ON FLIGHTS FROM SAT TO SDF AND SDF TO ANC PRIOR TO DISCOVERY.
